code:
gantt
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    title Incapacity Plan — Q4 2024 to Jan 2026
    excludes    weekends

    section Sprints
    Sprint 1                      :s1, 2024-09-02, 2024-09-13
    Sprint 2                      :s2, 2024-09-16, 2024-09-27
    Sprint 3                      :s3, 2024-09-30, 2024-10-11
    Sprint 4                      :s4, 2024-10-14, 2024-10-25
    Sprint 5                      :s5, 2024-10-28, 2024-11-08
    Sprint 6                      :s6, 2024-11-11, 2024-11-22
    Sprint 7                      :s7, 2024-11-25, 2024-12-06
    Sprint 8                      :s8, 2024-12-09, 2024-12-20

    section Core Scope
    Incapacity setup & data prep (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)    :active, 2024-09-02, 2024-09-13
    Flux integrations (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)    :active, 2024-09-16, 2024-09-27
    Potential beneficiaries list           :active, 2024-09-23, 2024-10-04
    AAC Batch consultation in Incapacity   :active, 2024-09-30, 2024-10-11
    Eligibility calculation engine         :active, 2024-09-30, 2024-10-18
    Issuance of the benefit                :active, 2024-10-14, 2024-11-08

    section Vault & Unions
    Vault changes to support JSON (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)    :crit, 2024-10-28, 2024-11-22
    Vault integration with Incapacity      :active, 2024-11-04, 2024-11-22
    Union JSON API decision (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)      :milestone, 2024-10-21, 1d
    Milestone 2 — demo week (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker):milestone, m2, 2024-11-18, 1d
    Unions test session #1                 :milestone, mu1, 2024-12-08, 1d
    Unions test session #2 (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)      :milestone, mu2, 2024-12-15, 1d

    section OCR, Letters, Migration
    OCR check via MyFlux                   :active, 2024-11-18, 2024-12-06
    Letter processing                      :active, 2024-11-18, 2024-11-29
    Migration — Fonds.net analysis         :active, 2024-10-01, 2024-10-31
    Migration — Phase 1 (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)   :crit,   2024-11-25, 2024-12-15
    Migration — Phase 2 (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic): 2025-01-06, 2025-02-28

    section Testing & Demos
    Milestone 1 — first demoable version   :milestone, m1, 2024-10-07, 1d
    Test: potential beneficiaries (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)    :2024-10-10, 2d
    Test: benefit rules (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)              :2024-10-24, 2d
    Compare Fonds.net vs Fluxmet (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)     :2024-11-12, 4d
    Validate eligibility for Jan issuance  :2024-12-05, 2d

    section Target
    First issuance Jan 2026                :milestone, goal, 2026-01-01, 1d
